analyzed: dge slong mang po 'dus pa dang ca cor gyur pas dus ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus brjod par byos shig /

analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / de dag nyid du dus la bab bo //

analyzed: dus la bab @203b bo; ;zhes brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gand'i brdung bar byos shig /

translated: But still others did not understand. The Blessed One said,🔽“First ring the small ghaṇṭā,

analyzed: ces gsungs so //

analyzed: de ltar yang gzhan nyin par gnas par song ba rnams kyis ma thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dung kha sdoms te bus la rnga yang rdungs shig / ces gsungs so //

original: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o ////
translated: This is the fifth chapter on the introduction, the first section of “The Discourse on the Five Points.”

original: mdor na / der ni rnga yang brdung par bya //
analyzed: mdor na / der ni rnga yang brdung par bya //
translated: The drum should be beaten there.🔽Then the chariot should be taken out,🔽and things should be obtained,

analyzed: de nas shing rta dbyung ba dang // dngos po byung dang rnyed pa dang // ji ltar tshul bzhin bsgo bar bya'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /

original: gang gi tshe nad pa rnams zas mnos zin par gyur la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nad pa rnams zas mnos zin par gyur la /

translated: Also, the feast was not distributed to the monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, and so on, who were staying in different places. The Blessed One said,

original: kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Distribute it.”

original: shing rta phyung zhig dang de dong nas rang 'dong ngo //
analyzed: shing rta phyung zhig dang de dong nas rang 'dong ngo //
translated: Pull out the chariot and it will return to its hole.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / mchod ston de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa grub pa de ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / mchod ston de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa grub pa de ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du mnyam par bgos shig /

analyzed: dge slong mang po 'dus pa de dag ca co byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bcu zhing gcig tu bgo bar bya'o //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu stong zhing gcig tu rnyed pa bgo bar byos shig /
translated: After that, divide the acquired goods into thousands and distribute them.

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa au pa lis zhus pa /
translated: The venerable Upāli asked the Buddha, the Blessed One:

analyzed: btsun pa / gal te bcu'i nang nas gcig dus las 'das na /

analyzed: gum pa'i yo byad su dbang zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: de ste bgo ba'i tshe dus 'das na /

analyzed: shi ba'i yo byad dge 'dun 'dus pa dbang gi /

analyzed: spyir bgos shig /

original: 'on te / bgos nas dus 'das na ni /
analyzed: 'on te / bgos nas dus 'das na ni /
translated: If the distribution has been made and the time has passed,

original: dgu bo rnams kyis 'thob bo //
analyzed: dgu bo rnams kyis 'thob bo //
translated: the nine receive it.

original: de bzhin du brgya stong sde rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du brgya stong sde rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way to the hundreds and thousands.

original: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o //
translated: This is the sixth chapter, on the five doors of the nidana, in “The Verse Commentary on the Summary of the Five Skandhas.”

original: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa rdzogs te /
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa rdzogs te /

original: gleng gzhi rnams rdzogs so ////
analyzed: gleng gzhi rnams rdzogs so ////

original: rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdor na /
analyzed: rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdor na /
translated: In the chapter on the single door,🔽the first is the salutation,

analyzed: phyag ni thog mar bya ba dang // gnyis pa'i snod rnams ma nges pa //
translated: the second is the uncertain vessels,

original: gsum du yo byad rnams kyang ste //
analyzed: gsum du yo byad rnams kyang ste //
translated: the third is the utensils,

original: de ni rkyang par btags pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rkyang par btags pa'o //
translated: and that is the single door.

original: mdor bsdus pa ni /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni /
translated: The summary is:🔽Salutation, grass,

original: phyag 'tshal @204b ba dang gsing ma dang // de bzhin 'jog dang nyal dang khyi //🔽de bzhin btung phor bu ram shing //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal @204b ba dang gsing ma dang // de bzhin 'jog dang nyal dang khyi // de bzhin btung phor bu ram shing //
translated: and likewise placing, sleeping, and house,🔽and likewise drinking vessel, sugarcane,

analyzed: de bzhin mar dang rtsa sdong rnams //

translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

analyzed: de'i tshe na dge slong gnyis shig rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam smra ba las /

analyzed: song ste bzod pa gsol lo //

analyzed: snyam bsam nas des de'i gnas khang du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas btsun pa /

analyzed: bdag gis khyod la rab tu spyos pa bzod par mdzod cig /
translated: please forgive me for scolding you.”

analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis thos nas rgyugs te tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: The monks heard this and rushed over, asking the venerable one,🔽“Why are you crying out?”

original: ci'i phyir 'o dod 'bod ces dris pa dang / des smras pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'o dod 'bod ces dris pa dang / des smras pa /
translated: He said,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /

analyzed: 'di ni / 'di ltar bdag gis gnas khang du 'ongs te gnod par byed pa la ltos /

analyzed: de dag gis de la /

original: de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
analyzed: de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
translated: They sat there without saying anything.

original: des bsam pa /
analyzed: des bsam pa /
translated: He thought,

analyzed: de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag byos shig par gsungs te /
translated: “That’s why the Blessed One said, ‘You should bow down to him.’

original: ci nas nga'i nyan thos rnams @205a *//
analyzed: ci nas nga'i nyan thos rnams @205a *//
translated: If my disciples

original: byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ro //🔽zhes gsungs na /
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ro // zhes gsungs na /

original: 'di ltar / 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di ni /
translated: this is what will happen.”

original: bdag mthong nas mi dga' ba dang / khros par gyur na /
analyzed: bdag mthong nas mi dga' ba dang / khros par gyur na /

analyzed: de nas dus phyi zhig na dge slong rgan pa dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig 'chag cing gtam zer zhing 'khod pa dang / dge slong de yang dge slong dag la phyag 'tshal ba las phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / 'chag pa'i grogs kyi dge slong des de la smras pa /
translated: “Later, the elder monk was walking and talking with another monk when that monk, who was bowing to the monks, came to that place. The monk who was his companion said to him,

original: tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: ‘Venerable,

analyzed: 'di lta bu'i dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di la ci'i phyir bzod par ma byas /

analyzed: rgan pa des /

analyzed: nga la mi byed do //

analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de bzhin des phyag byas pa dang / des smras pa /

original: tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: “Venerable!

analyzed: khyod kyis sdig pa'i sems can de mthong ngam /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa / mthong ngo // de nas des de la tshe dang ldan pa / bdag gis gzhan du thos nas gzhan du mthong ste /
translated: “Venerable!

original: khyod ni / ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa can /
analyzed: khyod ni / ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa can /

original: bslab pa la mos pa'o //
analyzed: bslab pa la mos pa'o //
translated: and that you are devoted to the training.

original: zhes thos na /
analyzed: zhes thos na /

analyzed: khyod ci'i phyir de ltar ma yin zhes smras pa dang / des btsun pa /
translated: “Noble one,

analyzed: bdag @205b gis ji ltar bgyi /
translated: what can I do?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa /
translated: “Venerable!🔽Why don’t you forgive a monk who is endowed with morality like this?”

analyzed: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di lta bu la khyod kyis ci'i phyir bzod pa mi bya zhes smras pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: He told them what had happened, and the monks criticized him. They told the Blessed One what had happened,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: dge slong rnams /
analyzed: dge slong rnams /
translated: “Monks,

analyzed: dge slong de 'phya ba ni /
translated: that monk who is being criticized

analyzed: yus kyi / gang rnam par 'khon pa de bzod par bya'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'khon pa de bzod par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, ‘One should be patient with the one who is angry.’

translated: When someone was patient, but the other person was not, the Blessed One said,🔽‘One should be patient with the one who is not patient.

analyzed: des kyang nad med cig ces smra'am /
translated: If the other person is not patient, then you should go to him and say, “I am well.”

original: yang na phyag byos shig /
analyzed: yang na phyag byos shig /

original: de ltar mi byed na /
analyzed: de ltar mi byed na /
translated: If you do not do that,

analyzed: gnyis ka la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khon pa'i dge slong la bzod par bya'o //

translated: Two monks were arguing,

analyzed: de gnyis las dge slong gzhon pas dge slong rgan pa la tshig drag po mi snyan pas blong zhing khros te smras pa dang / rab tu khros nas gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / sgo bcad nas des ngan du smras pa'i tshig de lta bu sgom zhing 'dug go /

translated: This is the first chapter, on the single gate, of the “Skandhaka.”🔽In brief, on grass, in a village, and in a group,🔽and by arousing the mind, and on the observance day,

analyzed: mdor na / gsing ma grong dang bsdus pa dang / sems bskyed pas ni gso sbyong dang / gsad pa gsum yang de bzhin te //

analyzed: rnam 'byed dge 'dun lhag ma'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying in Jetavana, Anāthapiṇḍada’s Park near Śrāvastī.🔽Some monks were traveling through the countryside with a large group of people.

original: dge slong dag cig 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig ljongs spyod du dong ba dang / de dag de'i tshe gso sbyong la bab nas de dag gis sa gsing ma'i phyogs shig mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: dge slong dag cig 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig ljongs spyod du dong ba dang / de dag de'i tshe gso sbyong la bab nas de dag gis sa gsing ma'i phyogs shig mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
translated: When it was time for the poṣadha ceremony, they saw a grassy area and said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerables,

analyzed: tshur shog / sa gsing ma'i phyogs @214a *//
translated: let’s go to that grassy area

original: pha bi la gso sbyong bya'o //
analyzed: pha bi la gso sbyong bya'o //

original: zhes de dag der gso sbyong byed pa la zhugs pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag 'das nas de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'dong ba las bar du rkun pos bcom ste gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste /
analyzed: zhes de dag der gso sbyong byed pa la zhugs pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag 'das nas de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'dong ba las bar du rkun pos bcom ste gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste /
translated: When they arrived at the monastery, the monks saw them and said,

original: bde bar 'ongs sam /
analyzed: bde bar 'ongs sam /
translated: “Welcome!

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Venerables,

original: bde bar 'ongs sam /
analyzed: bde bar 'ongs sam /
translated: welcome!”

original: ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang / bde bar ga la spyad /
analyzed: ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang / bde bar ga la spyad /
translated: They asked, Did you enjoy yourselves?

original: ci nyes / bdag cag ni /
analyzed: ci nyes / bdag cag ni /
translated: How could we enjoy ourselves?

original: rkun pos bcom mo //
analyzed: rkun pos bcom mo //

analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: They told the monks what had happened, and the monks told the Blessed One, and the Blessed One said,

analyzed: gsing ma la chags pa'i phyir gso sbyong ma byed cig /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dang / nye ba'i 'khor du gso sbyong byos shig / ces gsungs pa dang / de dag las dge slong phyed ni /
translated: The Blessed One said, Do the poṣadha in the village and its vicinity.

original: grong du zhugs /
analyzed: grong du zhugs /

analyzed: phyed ni / phyi rol du 'khod pas de dag ma 'dus par gyur nas gso sbyong ma byas te /

analyzed: de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks told the Blessed One what had happened, and the Blessed One said,

analyzed: gang grong na gnas pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who live in the village

original: grong du gso sbyong byos shig /
analyzed: grong du gso sbyong byos shig /

original: de bzhin du dge slong rnams gso sbyong bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slong rnams gso sbyong bya ste /
translated: “Monks, you should do the poṣadha.

original: gso sbyong la ma sdod cig /
analyzed: gso sbyong la ma sdod cig /
translated: Do not delay the poṣadha.

original: sdod na / 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdod na / 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you delay it, you will be in violation of the training.”

original: dge slong dag cig tshong pa'i 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu lam du zhugs pa dang / dge @214b slong gis tshong pa la /
analyzed: dge slong dag cig tshong pa'i 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu lam du zhugs pa dang / dge @214b slong gis tshong pa la /
translated: Some monks were traveling on the road with a large group of merchants. The monks said to the merchants,

original: bzhin bzang / bdag cag gso sbyong byed kyi /
analyzed: bzhin bzang / bdag cag gso sbyong byed kyi /
translated: “Good people, we are doing the poṣadha.

original: de'i bar du skad cig sdod cig /
analyzed: de'i bar du skad cig sdod cig /

original: ces smras pa dang / de dag gis 'phags pa rnams /
analyzed: ces smras pa dang / de dag gis 'phags pa rnams /
translated: The merchants said, “Noble ones,

original: 'di phyogs na rkun pos 'jigs kyi /
analyzed: 'di phyogs na rkun pos 'jigs kyi /
translated: in this area there is danger from thieves.

original: phyi bzhin spyon cig /🔽bsdad do // zhes smras pa dang / der sdod grang /
analyzed: phyi bzhin spyon cig / bsdad do // zhes smras pa dang / der sdod grang /
translated: Please come along with us.”🔽The monks thought, “Should we stay here?

analyzed: der sdod grang snyam nas dge slong rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing de dag dong ba las nam nangs so //
translated: Should we stay here?” The monks followed the merchants. They traveled until dawn.

original: dge slong rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks told the Blessed One what had happened, and the Blessed One said,🔽“Monks, you should not do the poṣadha with householders.

original: dge slong rnams gso sbyong gi tshe gso sbyong ma byas par ma 'gro zhig /
analyzed: dge slong rnams gso sbyong gi tshe gso sbyong ma byas par ma 'gro zhig /
translated: “Monks, when you are doing the poṣadha, do not go without doing the poṣadha.

original: yang na 'gro bzhin du gso sbyong byos shig /
analyzed: yang na 'gro bzhin du gso sbyong byos shig /
translated: Or else, do the poṣadha while you are going.

original: dge slong dag gis 'gro bzhin du gso sbyong byed pa la zhugs pa dang / tshong pa rnams kyis 'phags pa /🔽bdag cag ni /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis 'gro bzhin du gso sbyong byed pa la zhugs pa dang / tshong pa rnams kyis 'phags pa / bdag cag ni /
translated: ” The monks began to do the poṣadha while they were going, and the merchants said, “Noble ones,🔽we are afraid of thieves,

original: rkun pos 'jigs pas cang mi smra bar 'gro na /
analyzed: rkun pos 'jigs pas cang mi smra bar 'gro na /
translated: so we go without speaking.🔽Why are you making a racket?”

analyzed: khyed cag ci'i phyir ca co byed ces smras nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks told the Blessed One what had happened, and the Blessed One said,

original: gso sbyong rgyas par ma byed par mdor byos shig /
analyzed: gso sbyong rgyas par ma byed par mdor byos shig /
translated: “Do not do the poṣadha in detail; do it in brief.

original: dge slong rnams kyis mdor byed pa la zhugs pa dang / 'on kyang tshong pa de dag gis dpyas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis mdor byed pa la zhugs pa dang / 'on kyang tshong pa de dag gis dpyas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The monks began to do the poṣadha in brief, but the merchants still complained. The Blessed One said,

original: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlobs shig /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlobs shig /
translated: “Consecrate it by merely arousing the thought.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: dge slong rnams chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / gos bsngo ba dang / gso sbyong dang / tshul @215a *//🔽nas byung ba 'di bzhi ni /
analyzed: dge slong rnams chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / gos bsngo ba dang / gso sbyong dang / tshul @215a *// nas byung ba 'di bzhi ni /
translated: The four that are sources of disputes are:🔽the monk’s consecration of the Dharma robes,🔽the monk’s dedication of robes,🔽the purification and restoration ceremony,🔽and the monk’s way of life.

original: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub bo //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub bo //
translated: The four things that are accomplished by merely generating the thought are:🔽the consecration of the robes of the monks,🔽the dedication of robes,🔽the purification and confession,🔽and the going forth.

original: de yang 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: This is how it is done.

original: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste sems bskyed par byos la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste sems bskyed par byos la /
translated: You should generate the thought by means of the close setting of mindfulness focused on the Buddha,

original: gso sbyong byin gyis rlobs shig /
analyzed: gso sbyong byin gyis rlobs shig /
translated: and you should consecrate the purification and confession.

original: de nas tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste /🔽deng dge 'dun rnams kyi bco lnga'i gso sbyong ste /
analyzed: de nas tshig tu yang brjod par bya ste / deng dge 'dun rnams kyi bco lnga'i gso sbyong ste /
translated: Then you should say the words:🔽Today is the purification and confession of the saṅgha on the fifteenth.

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yang bco lnga'i gso sbyong ste /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yang bco lnga'i gso sbyong ste /
translated: Today is the purification and confession of the monk named so-and-so.

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag go /🔽zhes rang gis brjod de /
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag go / zhes rang gis brjod de /
translated: I, named so-and-so, am also pure with regard to the factors that are obstacles.

original: gso sbyong byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: gso sbyong byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Having said that, you should consecrate the purification and confession.

original: gang gi tshe dge 'dun 'dus pa phrad pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dge 'dun 'dus pa phrad pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bya'o //
translated: When the saṅgha has gathered and met, at that time you should perform the purification and confession together with the saṅgha.

original: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod de gso sbyong de ltar bya'o //🔽gso sbyong mi bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod de gso sbyong de ltar bya'o // gso sbyong mi bya ba ni /
translated: The purification should be done in this way.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the purification should not be done.

original: ma byas na ni /
analyzed: ma byas na ni /
translated: If it is not done,

original: 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: it becomes a transgression.

original: gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The Setting

original: mnyan du yod pa na ste /
analyzed: mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: In Śrāvastī,

original: dge slong dag cig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa na rkun pos zin nas de dag gis /
analyzed: dge slong dag cig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa na rkun pos zin nas de dag gis /
translated: some monks were traveling through the countryside when they were captured by thieves.🔽The thieves said,

original: kye / bsam rlag tu 'khod de ci byed kyi /
analyzed: kye / bsam rlag tu 'khod de ci byed kyi /
translated: “Hey, sit down and think about what you’re going to do.

original: mgo reg 'di dag gsad do //
analyzed: mgo reg 'di dag gsad do //
translated: We’re going to kill these shaven-headed men.”

original: zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bsam pa /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bsam pa /
translated: The monks thought,

original: bdag cag ni /
analyzed: bdag cag ni /
translated: “They’re going to kill us.”

original: gsad par chad pa lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la /
analyzed: gsad par chad pa lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la /
translated: They said to the thieves,🔽“Hey, why are you going to kill us?”

analyzed: kye / ci'i phyir nged cag gsad ces smras pa dang / rkun pos smras pa /
translated: The thieves said,

analyzed: khyed la rgyal po dang / phyug po dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams rab tu dad @215b pas khyed kyis de dag la smras pa dang / de dag gis nged la gnod par byed do //
translated: “The king, the rich, the guild masters, and the caravan leaders have faith in you. You have told them things, and they have harmed us.

analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de na dge slong gzhon nu zhig brdzun du smras pa las byung ba'i nyes pa ltung ba byung ste / des tshe dang ldan pa rnams /
translated: Then a young monk who had committed a downfall from lying said, Venerables,🔽please wait a moment while I confess the downfall I have incurred.

analyzed: bdag gi ltung ba byung ba bshags pa de'i bar du bsdad par ci gnang zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis de ltar na /

analyzed: gnas 'di nyid du shogs shig /
translated: confess it right here.

analyzed: ces smras pa dang / des dge slong gi mdun du 'chags pa la zhugs te /
translated: He began to confess in front of the monks, Venerables,

original: dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa rnams /
analyzed: dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa rnams /
translated: please listen.

analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba shes bzhin gyi rdzun smras pa las byung ba'i ltung ba'i nyes pa mchis te /
translated: I, so-and-so, have incurred a downfall from lying.

original: bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du bshags so //
analyzed: bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du bshags so //
translated: I confess it in front of you.

original: mthol lo // mi 'chab bo //
analyzed: mthol lo // mi 'chab bo //
translated: I reveal it. I do not conceal it.

original: bshags shing mthol na /
analyzed: bshags shing mthol na /
translated: If I confess and reveal it,

original: bdag la bde bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: bdag la bde bar 'gyur gyi /

original: ma bshags ma mthol na ni /
analyzed: ma bshags ma mthol na ni /

analyzed: ma yin no // des smras pa /

original: nyes par mthong ngam /
analyzed: nyes par mthong ngam /

analyzed: mthong ngo // phyin chad sdom par 'cha'am /

analyzed: dam 'cha'o // de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du smras pa dang / rkun po de dag thams cad kyis thos pa dang / de dag gis smras pa /

analyzed: 'phags pa / khyed rnams rdzun mi smra'am /
translated: “Noble ones, you are not lying, are you?”

original: bzhin bzang / mi smra'o /
analyzed: bzhin bzang / mi smra'o /
translated: “Good sirs, we are not.”

original: zhes smras pa dang / de dag mngon du dad nas 'phags pa rnams /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de dag mngon du dad nas 'phags pa rnams /
translated: When they heard this, they became filled with faith.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: “Noble ones, if that is so,

original: dengs la su la yang ma smra zhig /
analyzed: dengs la su la yang ma smra zhig /
translated: then please leave. Do not tell anyone else.”

original: ces smras pa dang / nad med cig /
analyzed: ces smras pa dang / nad med cig /
translated: “May you be well.”

original: su la yang mi smra'o //
analyzed: su la yang mi smra'o //
translated: “We will not tell anyone.”

analyzed: zhes smras te dong nas de dag gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang the @216a *//
translated: With that, they left. When they arrived at the monastery, they were filled with doubt.

original: tshom skyes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: tshom skyes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When the monks asked the Blessed One about this, the Blessed One said,

analyzed: dge slong rnams /
translated: “Monks,

analyzed: nags tshal gyi dbang po rkun po'i drung du bshags pa yin gyi /
translated: the Lord of the Forest confessed to the thieves.

analyzed: de la the tshom du ma byed cig /
translated: Do not doubt this.”

analyzed: gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The Setting

analyzed: mnyan du yod pa na ste /
translated: In Śrāvastī.

analyzed: dge slong gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa la rkun pos zin nas de dag gis /

analyzed: bsam rlag tu 'khod de ci byed kyi /

original: mgo reg 'di dag gsad do //
analyzed: mgo reg 'di dag gsad do //

original: zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bsam pa /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bsam pa /
translated: The monks thought,

analyzed: bdag cag ni /

original: gsad par chad pa lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la /
analyzed: gsad par chad pa lta snyam nas de dag gis rkun po la /
translated: So they asked the thieves,

analyzed: kye / ci'i phyir nged gsad ces smras pa dang / rkun pos smras pa /

translated: You told them,
